Graph Legend:
Cylinder: Entity
Orange Diamond: Boundary Action
Red Square: Policy
Blue Circle: Mechanism
Transparent Circle: State Variable

Action Map

State

Local States

Service State

Name Description Type Symbol Domain
NameThe name of the servicestr
Gateway API PrefixPrefix for the gateway APIstr
Service IDThe identifier used for the chainstr

Spaces

Service Join Space

{name: str,
gateway_api_prefix: str,
service_id: str}

Service Leave Space

{service_id: str}

Behavioral Action Space

Service Join

Action for Service moving to be added to the system.

Called By:

1. Service

Constraints:

Service Leave

Action for Service moving to leave the system.

Called By:

1. Service

Constraints:

Control Action Space

Policies

Service Join Policy

The policy which decides whether a service can be added to the system.

Preceded By:

1. Service Join

Domain Spaces:

1. Service Join Space

Followed By:

1. Add New Service

Codomain Spaces:

1. Service Join Space

Constraints:

Policy Options:

1. Service Join Policy V1

Basic policy option.

Logic: If the servicer id is in the supported_services parameter and it is not already present in the system, continue the action chain. Otherwise terminate.


Service Leave Policy

The policy which decides whether a service is able to leave the system.

Preceded By:

1. Service Leave

Domain Spaces:

1. Service Leave Space

Followed By:

1. Remove Service

Codomain Spaces:

1. Service Leave Space

Constraints:

Mechanisms

Add New Service

Create a new service entity from the message and add it to the global state

Preceded By:

1. Service Join Policy

Domain Spaces:

1. Service Join Space

State Updates:

1. Global.Services

Constraints:

Logic:

DOMAIN[0] is used to create the new service and then it is appended to the global state's services.

Remove Service

Mechanism which removes services

Preceded By:

1. Service Leave Policy

Domain Spaces:

1. Service Leave Space

State Updates:

1. Global.Services

Constraints:

Logic:

The service in DOMAIN[0] is removed.

Parameters

supported_services
